message: Let's split it fairly, I'll give you a good start!
You didn't give me a good start, now I'll take a fair share!
Let's compromise, I'll give you a decent share!
You're still being stingy, I'll try to get a better deal!
I'm getting desperate, but I'll give you a bit more!
You're running out of time, I'll take what I can get!
I'm getting desperate, take it or leave it!
I'm not going to take less than 80% of the remaining pie!
I'm almost out of time, take it or leave it!
I'm not going to settle for less than 90% of what's left!
I'm making a final offer, take it or leave it!
You're going to regret it if you don't accept this final offer!
